Summary: Six objects all oval in shape
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Yuma
There were no other sightings in Yuma on or around June 18th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsat approx 9:30 pm on 6-18-2007 my dogs started going crazy, me and my 5 year old son went outside to see why and we could see these bright lights coming towards our house from the south west fromt the desert. keep in mind i am a professional photographer, i have several still cameras and a video camera always on the charger. these objects traveled at a impressive rate of speed, we have alot of military aircraft from mcas yuma that fly around our house, these flew faster than a helicopter but slower than a fighter jet. i was able to get photos from far away but they traveled at least 60 miles in between my digital camera resetting itself for the next photos which takes about 15 seconds. then as they got closer my camera went dead.i then went for my kodack camera which had been on the charger for 2 days, it powered on but as i tried to photograph these lights the camera shut off and the battery died. i ran and grabbbed my video camera which has been charging for 5 days and ran back out of my house , by this time the objects were over my house , my son and i could see the shapes clearly even in the darkness.they were six oval shaped objects that seemed to slow to a hover over us at i would guess 2000 ft above us. i tried to video tape them and my video camera turned on then turned off and the battery light flashed. within seconds the objects then accelerated to the martinez lake \dome area and disappeared over the hills. i have no idea if these are govt aircraft but i have never seen anything like this in my life (3 photos in all)
